values:
a lovely lovely song by Jar of Clay
I want to Fall in love with you.


In open fields of wild flowers,
she breathes the air and flies away
She thanks her Jesus for the daises and the roses
in no simple language
Someday she'll understand the meaning of it all
He's more than the laughter or the stars in the heavens
As close a heartbeat or a song on her lips
Someday she'll trust Him and learn how to see Him
Someday He'll call her and she will come running
and fall in His arms and the tears will fall down and she'll pray,
"I want to fall in love with You"

Sitting silent wearing Sunday best
The sermon echoes through the walls
A great salvation through it calls to the people
who stare into nowhere, and can't feel the chains on their souls

He's more than the laughter or the stars in the heavens
As close a heartbeat or a song on our lips
Someday we'll trust Him and learn how to see Him
Someday He'll call us and we will come running
and fall in His arms and the tears will fall down and we'll pray,
"I want to fall in love with You"

It seems too easy to call you "Savior",
Not close enough to call you "God"
So as I sit and think of words I can mention
to show my devotion

"I want to fall in love with You"

"my heart beats for You"

Well. Sorta. Mocks are finally over!
*dance*
so relieved. But now.
The results! Eee!!
Sigh. One stress after another.
I also still have my Coursework to do.
Shit.

Finally! They are over! art mocks are done.
TT^TT < tears of joy. haha.
10 hours work. Doesn't really look like it though.
Hmmm. But it really did take 10 hours. Hope I get a good grade.

O my gawd, Its the 3rd day of mocks! 7 days more then its all over!
Papers left:
Biology
Religious Education
English Language 2
History 2
Maths Non Calculator.

Other mocks:
Art
Ceramics.
Both. 10. hours each. GAH!
Am so going to bring my iPod with me.
Sigh.

So tired now.
After today's english literature paper I suddenly feel relived as though I've finished the mocks. Its really odd.
But.
Sigh.

7 days more. 7 days. more. 7 days more.
T_T

Wow. I cannot believe it. 1 year has already passed. 
Time waits for noone as they say.
It brings back memories of when I 1st came and had my first half term.
It starts after the FunRun tomorrow.
I remember when mom and dad came down.
Sigh.

-random babble-

Whee~
I am so hyper now which is really bizzare cause I am ironically really tired. XD I think it was Sasa's chocolate. Havent had chocolate in a while. Well, really nice ones anyway. Heh. Ah. Need to calm down and clean up my room. Its in such a big mess. Theres hardly any walking space for me now. Sigh. Finally went out today and got a guitar case. Wasnt that bad. Considering that Im in the UK. I am getting better! So, double whee~
But I still have to take penicillin. Blargh. It tastes so foul. 

Well anyway, lets list my priorities for the week:
1. Biology [almost done] (monday)
2. English Poetry Coursework ._. (tuesday)
3. Ceramics (wednesday)
4. Guitar practice
5. Piano practice
6. English Essay (friday)
7. Art [think i've done enough]
8. Talk to a teacher about dropping drama. [really dont know what to do :( ]

I think thats about it really.
Gah~

Should go clean my room. Heh

Gah! I hate being ill. 2 weeks of being ill is not fun. sigh 
Atleast I dont have glandular fever. =/ 
Got some weird throat infection. Blargh~ 
I am so unlucky when it comes to health.  
I still need to finish my RS coursework.. Going to get well rested so I can finish it today. 
Which i probably can. But.. heh. 
Ooo.. I got loadsa pills to take now. Well. Not that many 
But still. About 2 pills every 4-5 hours. Thats just penicillin. 
I'll probably need to take loads of panadol as well. Gah~

Heh.
Got to sleep in today. Had a slight fever.
Was sick for bout 4 days now.
Oh! I went to get my neck checked out. It seems that the lump/s
(yes. I have more than 1 now)
Are swollen glands. Which possibly means that I could have
glandular fever.
I had to get a blood test to check it out. which hurts. T_T

For those who dont know what Glandular fever is.
Heres a description:
Glandular fever (Infectious mononucleosis) is a virus infection causing sore throat, fever, enlarged and tender glands, and sometimes inflammation of the liver (hepatitis). It frequently causes a prolonged period of tiredness and debility.

The annoying thing about this is that. Its on and off... So, I can feel really great 1 minute and absolutely crap the next. ._____.
Soooo.. Yea.. i'm waiting for the results to come back. But.. I dont think I've got it anyway. =/

Blargh~.

*rant rant rant*

off to do art.

Today was "fun". Got to dissect a pig's heart. I think it's a pig's anyway.
I thought it would be all gross but it wasn't too bad actually.
The disgusting part was the smell. Ugh *shudder*
It smelt so bad. I nearly threw up.
I just stabbed and prodded it a few times then left it there cause I couldnt stand the smell any more. Strangely enough, Charlotte could smell anything.. 
I was just like. Do you even have a sense of smell? Cause like, everyone could smell how wrank it was..

Anyway.
I am actually drowning in artwork.. And I am still procrastinating. Haha.
I am such a lazy git. 
Gah! and i Havent revised for RE yet.

*rant *rant *rant*
